description: A revised memorial for Mona's Queen is held as the Manx "fight another battle" against coronavirus.
title: Mona's Queen: Crew of Manx boat lost at Dunkirk remembered
title_page: Mona's Queen: Crew of Manx boat lost at Dunkirk remembered - BBC News
maintext: "I sympathise and empathise with those who were doing the same job as me [but got] caught up in a war," he said.
